00031 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlInterface::CurlInterface(){
00032   customErrorMessage="";
00033   serverResponse=-1;
00034 }

00039 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlInterface::~CurlInterface(){
00040 }

00049 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlInterface::init(){
00050   LOGI("Initializing the libcurl interface");
00051   handle=curl_easy_init();
00052 
00053   if (handle)
00054     return true;
00055   else{
00056 
00057     LOGE("An error occured during the libcurl iitialization");
00058 
00059     return false;
00060   }
00061 }
00062 
00067 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlInterface::cleanup(){
00068   LOGI("Cleaning up the libcurl interface");
00069 
00070   if (handle){
00071     curl_easy_cleanup( handle );
00072     handle=NULL;
00073   }
00074   else{
00075     LOGW("Calling cleanup on a non-existing handle");
00076   }
00077   return true;
00078 }

00084 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlInterface::setFilename(const char* s){
00085   this->filename=s;
00086 }

00092 const char* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlInterface::getFilename(){
00093   return this->filename.c_str();
00094 }

00102 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlInterface::setWriteFunction(void* f){
00103   LOGI("Setting up a custom WriteFunction");
00104 
00105 
00106   if (handle)
00107     curl_easy_setopt(handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, f);
00108   else
00109     LOGW("Cannot set a WriteFunction, the handle is undefined");
00110 }
00111 
00115 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlInterface::setDefaultWriteFunction(){
00116   LOGI("Setting the default WriteFunction");
00117 
00118   if (handle)
00119     curl_easy_setopt(handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, writeData);
00120   else
00121     LOGW("Cannot set a the default WriteFunction, the handle is undefined");
00122 
00123 }

00134 long RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlInterface::getServerResponse(){
00135   return this->serverResponse;

00144 const char* RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlInterface::getCustomErrorMessage(){
00145 
00146   return customErrorMessage;
00147 }
00148 
00159 void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlInterface::setCustomErrorMessage(
00160                                                       const char* msg){
00161 
00162   if (strlen(customErrorMessage)!=0){
00163     LOGW("A customErrorMessage already exists. "
00164          "Only the first message is kept");
00165   }
00166   else{
00167     customErrorMessage=msg;
00168   }
00169 }
